object.name: blackberry.utils
object.comment: The Utils object provides useful utility functions and properties.

func.name: generateUniqueId
func.comment: This method will generate a unique numbers.

func.name: parseURL
func.comment: parse an URL string into an URL object.

param.name: url
param.comment: The URL string to be parsed.

func.details: An exception will be thrown if an invalid URL string is given. There currently is a known issue if you attempt to parse a local:/// path with this method. It will throw an invalid URL error. To work around this limitation you should string replace "local:///" with "local://".
